text: @sarahcpr @MichellesDude Wait, I'm confused! Are you guys suggesting that swallowing the ultraviolet light in my toothbrush cleaning thingy-ma-bob is not going to prevent #COVID19 What the hell am I going to do with this plug hanging out my ass now then?
